item.title: Machine Learning in Banking
item.description: Variation exists in all processes, understanding and reducing variation are keys to success. Financial industry consists of Banking and Non-banking, with focus to banking we have the following below: Consumer lending E-payment Business lending With focus on the project associated with the case study used is consumer lending to determine the credit worthiness of consumers, where lenders use various factors such as credit score, annual income, the loan amount approved, tenure, debt to income ratio etc, and then select your interest rates.
